scope.title: Chakra UI Image - Horizon UI
scope.description: The Image component is used to display images with support for fallback.

frontMatter.excerpt: The Image component is used to display images.
frontMatter.mdxContent:
---
title: Chakra UI Image - Horizon UI
package: "@chakra-ui/image"
image: "components/image.svg"
description:
  The Image component is used to display images with support for fallback.
---

The `Image` component is used to display images.

Image composes `Box` so you can use all the style props and add responsive
styles as well.

## Import

```tsx
import { Image } from "@chakra-ui/react"
```

## Usage

```jsx
<Box boxSize="sm">
  <Image
    src="https://demos.creative-tim.com/horizon-ui-chakra/static/media/signInImage.eeb0c777.png"
    alt="Horizon UI"
  />
</Box>
```

```tsx
<Box boxSize="sm">
  <Image
    src="https://demos.creative-tim.com/horizon-ui-chakra/static/media/signInImage.eeb0c777.png"
    alt="Horizon UI"
  />
</Box>
```

## Size

The size of the image can be adjusted using the `boxSize` prop.

```jsx
<Stack direction="row">
  <Image
    boxSize="100px"
    objectFit="cover"
    src="https://demos.creative-tim.com/horizon-ui-chakra/static/media/signInImage.eeb0c777.png"
    alt="Horizon UI"
  />
  <Image
    boxSize="150px"
    objectFit="cover"
    src="https://demos.creative-tim.com/horizon-ui-chakra/static/media/signInImage.eeb0c777.png"
    alt="Free Chakra UI Dashboard"
  />
  <Image
    boxSize="200px"
    src="https://demos.creative-tim.com/horizon-ui-chakra/static/media/signInImage.eeb0c777.png"
    alt="Free Chakra UI Dashboard"
  />
</Stack>
```

```tsx
<Stack direction="row">
  <Image
    boxSize="100px"
    objectFit="cover"
    src="https://demos.creative-tim.com/horizon-ui-chakra/static/media/signInImage.eeb0c777.png"
    alt="Horizon UI"
  />
  <Image
    boxSize="150px"
    objectFit="cover"
    src="https://demos.creative-tim.com/horizon-ui-chakra/static/media/signInImage.eeb0c777.png"
    alt="Free Chakra UI Dashboard"
  />
  <Image
    boxSize="200px"
    src="https://demos.creative-tim.com/horizon-ui-chakra/static/media/signInImage.eeb0c777.png"
    alt="Free Chakra UI Dashboard"
  />
</Stack>
```

## Image with border radius

```jsx
<Image
  borderRadius="full"
  boxSize="150px"
  src="https://demos.creative-tim.com/horizon-ui-chakra/static/media/signInImage.eeb0c777.png"
  alt="Horizon UI"
/>
```

```tsx
<Image
  borderRadius="full"
  boxSize="150px"
  src="https://demos.creative-tim.com/horizon-ui-chakra/static/media/signInImage.eeb0c777.png"
  alt="Horizon UI"
/>
```

## Fallback support

You can provide a fallback image for when there is an error loading the `src` of
the image. You can also opt out of this behavior by passing the `ignoreFallback`
prop.

```jsx
<Image src="gibbresh.png" fallbackSrc="https://via.placeholder.com/150" />
```

```tsx
<Image src="gibbresh.png" fallbackSrc="https://via.placeholder.com/150" />
```

### Improvements from v1

- Added support for the `fit` prop to specify how to fit an image within its
  dimension. It uses the `object-fit` property.

- Added support for the `align` prop to specify how to align the image within
  its dimension. It uses the `object-position` property.

- Added support for custom `fallback` component.

## Usage with SSR

```tsx
import { Img } from "@chakra-ui/react"
```

The `Img` Component provides a fallback for SSR applications which uses the
image directly without client side checks.

## Props

<PropsTable of="Image" />
frontMatter.title: Chakra UI Image - Horizon UI
frontMatter.description: The Image component is used to display images with support for fallback.
